https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pi9xv2aeLZoWZGQPne6IotEHfEV.jpg Eazhaiyin Sirippil is a 2000 Tamil film directed by SUBHASH. The film stars Prabhu Deva, Kausalya, Roja and Suvalakshmi in lead roles. Eazhaiyin Sirippil
